project.name: XBee IO Samples Endpoint Radio Example Activity
project.description: This Java-based activity configures an XBee endpoint radio for IO sampling and sends the sample packets to the coordinator.

property.name: space.hardware.serial.port
property.description: The serial port the XBee is attached to. In Linux it will have a value like /dev/ttyUSB0. This is usually added in the Live Activity configuration in the Master Web Admin.
